      void Message.open(Agent unlockedRecipient, AgentStorage storage)
      open the envelope, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent the private key has to be unlocked first!
      void Message.open(AgentStorage storage)
      open the envelope, i.e. decrypt the content with the private key of the receiving agent The storage has to know an unlocked version of the recipient agent!
      void Message.verifySignature()
      verify the signature of this message the content has to be available for this
